Hierarchical Clustering Analysis for multiplex cytokines assay

28 Sep 2018

Hierarchical Clustering has been widely used in analyzing the cluster pattern in multivariable dataset.

In this post, hierarchical clustering analysis is applied to the data generated from cytokines multi-plex assays.
First thing first, for my immunologist fellows, what is hierarchical clustering?
